data.actual_result: The app immediately crashes after selecting the image.
data.expected_result: The avatar gets loaded into the Discord editor
data.short_description: The app immediately crashes upon selecting an image from your device to use as your avatar if you used FX File Chooser *(Only crashes with FX File Explorer)*
data.steps_to_repro: - Install FX File Explorer from Gplay if not installed already - Go to app settings - Go to "My Account" - Click "Remove" (Your icon should revert to default) - Click on the image to begin selection - Select any image from your device ! Make sure you use FX File Chooser !
